citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
20-OCT-16.
The inspector arrived at the property and then called the phone number provided. The facility representative stated
that no one was available for an inspection today.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
20-OCT-16.
The inspector arrived at the property and then called the phone number provided. The facility representative stated
that no one was available for an inspection today.
